text: VOICEOVER: Previously on MasterChef Australia...

With three immunity pins up for grabs...

..the competition started with a bang.
Whoo! Yay!
Favourites Tommy and Christina...

In today's challenge,
you are gonna prepare and serve a three-course meal.
Right now, you're both in a team of 12.
But in a moment, you're gonna split yourselves into courses.
Four of you will be in charge of entrees, four in charge of mains,
four in charge of desserts.
Your goal is to make your course better than the other team's course.
The winning entree, the winning main and the winning dessert
will progress to tomorrow's challenge
where you'll be one step closer to immunity from Sunday.
Fans, Favourites, you need to organise yourselves into courses.
Right now.
Alright. OK, team.
OK, so... I'll go entree.
I'll go entree or main, I just don't want to do dessert.

I'm not going dessert...

You guys are on desserts, excellent.
